data.title: Law Enforcement – H&H Shooting Sports
data.text:
Local Law Enforcement Gear for Sale in Oklahoma City

H&H is honored to have active-duty military and law enforcement personnel shoot on our ranges. It’s thanks to the sacrifice of these great service people that we are able to enjoy the freedom of this great nation.

We are proud to be a law enforcement official distributor for:

AMMO: SIG SAUER

HANDGUNS: GLOCK, SIG SAUER, SPRINGFIELD ARMORY, WALTHER

RIFLES: DANIEL DEFENSE, FRANKLIN ARMORY, ROCK RIVER ARMS, SIG SAUER , SPRINGFIELD ARMORY, TIKKA

SHOTGUNS: BERETTA, BENELLI

SUPPRESSORS: DEAD AIR, HUXWRX, SILENCERCO, SUREFIRE

LIGHTING: SUREFIRE, STREAMLIGHT

OPTICS: EOTECH, HOLOSUN, SIG SAUER, TRIJICON, VORTEX

CLOTHING: FIRST TACTICAL, ORIGINAL FOOTWEAR COMPANY

GEAR: SAFARILAND/BIANCHI, LOOPER BRAND

BODY ARMOR: POINT BLANK

SAFES: BROWNING SAFES, LIBERTY SAFES

We also have access to numerous other brands and are adding to our available options on a regular basis. If we don’t have access to it, we will be more than happy to help you find a solution.

H&H Shooting Sports is the official home of Looper Brand Duty and Off-duty Holsters and Leather Gear.

H&H offers Law Enforcement discounts on select firearms. All that is necessary to qualify is a valid commission card and drivers license.

We are proud to work with local law enforcement agencies by providing the necessary firepower and accessories to let the good guys do their job.

Need a quote or information on a prospective order?

Please Call us at (405) 947-3888

Springfield FIRSTLINE Program

Springfield Armory has strong connections to those that serve both our nation and its citizens. And with its FIRSTLINE program, it has a new way to thank them for their service. This program, open to a wide range of qualified professionals, is designed to offer a select listing of Springfield Armory firearms at discounted pricing in a simple, streamlined process. The select list of firearms includes 37 specific models and variants, and all pistols offered in the line come with three magazines. The products offered in the FIRSTLINE program come from the Hellcat, 1911, XD, SAINT, Hellion and M1A families of firearms.

See if you qualify: https://spr-ar.com/r/5126

GLOCK BLUE LABEL PROGRAM

H&H Shooting Sports is proud to be a Glock Blue Label dealer in Oklahoma City, OK. We offer exclusive pricing on Glock pistols to eligible military and law enforcement personnel. Glock Blue Label prices are only available through Glock Blue Label dealers like H&H. If you are active or retired military personnel, a law enforcement officer, or first responder, you may be eligible for the Glock Blue Label program. Contact us today to learn more about the Glock Blue Label program.
